original_text: But David went up the ascent of the Mount of Olives, weeping as he went, barefoot and with his head covered. And all the people who were with him covered their heads, and they went up, weeping as they went.
korean_text: 다윗이 감람 산 길로 올라갈 때에 그의 머리를 그가 가리고 맨발로 울며 가고 그와 함께 가는 모든 백성들도 각각 자기의 머리를 가리고 울며 올라가니라

sentences.original_text: But David went up the ascent of the Mount of Olives
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다윗은 올리브 산 언덕을 올라갔습니다

sentences.original_text: barefoot and with his head covered
And all the people who were with him covered their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 모든 백성도 머리를 가렸습니다
